--- Page 3 ---
Warranties
CWSB will not warranty any blinds, according to the following:
·
Any oversized blind which is ordered outside normal specifications or price grids
·
Issues due to incorrect installations
·
Storm damage
·
Defects such as misuse, alterations, maintenance & care not according to our
instructions or not carried out by CWSB.
·
We will not take responsibility for any further loss or damage e.g. Installations costs
and other expenses.
·
Insignificant wear and tear
Fabric flaws: The customer must notify CWSB. Before any decision regarding flaws can be
made, the customer must deliver the blind/s mentioned to our store to be assessed by the supplier 
of fabric.
Returned Goods
CWSB will only accept returned goods with prior authorisation.
Upon return to CWSB, the goods must arrive in appropriate packaging and will be
inspected by a staff member. When goods are returned to our factory, an Order form MUST 
accompany the goods and a copy be emailed or faxed to our office. Each blind is to be 
labelled with the Company and Account name. If no Order form is supplied, the returns will be
put ON HOLD until the appropriate paperwork is received.
Order Forms
We accept Orders via fax or email. We do not accept any Order/s via telephone.
If the Order form/s does not have the required and correct information, the Order/s will be placed 
ON HOLD until customer notifies the correct details.
Cancellations
Only written cancellations via fax or email will be accepted. If the manufacture of the goods has
not commenced, the cancellation will be accepted.
Payment Terms
·
Account Customers – Nett 30 days from Invoice date.
·
New customers are to be placed on C.O.D terms until further notice.
·
An Automatic Stop supply process will apply 30 days from the statement date,
if the required payments are not up to date.
Delivery
Freight will be charged according to suburb/town areas – per delivery. For heavy tubes and goods,
our driver will need assistance at your depot to unload.
Pick-up of Goods
CONDITIONS OF SALE
Creative Wholesale Blinds (CWSB) Warranty provisions are limited to the replacement of any Components 
and Fabric found to have manufacture defects, within 5 Years of manufacture.
No claims for damage or defects will be recognised after 7 days from collection date of the finished 
products from our factory.
All Installers or your company representatives MUST see a CWSB staff member and sign the 'Pick up 
Registry'.   Goods are to be picked up within 7 days of notification by Invoice.
July 2025
Creative Wholesale Blinds
              GST Not Included
1

SENSORS

Please Note:
Supply of own Motors to Creative Wholesale Blinds
Faulty Motors
* If supplying own Motor/s a $50 surcharge per blind will apply as assembling
fees.
* Customers will incur a Freight surcharge for faulty motors being sent back
to ACMEDA. A Credit will apply after the issue has been resolved.
July 2025

Faulty Motors

assembling fees.

--- Page 7 ---
Standard features
• Spline at top is standard
• Straight valance is standard
• If Scallop or no valance is required please specify
• Width measurement - exact skin width
• Drop Measurement - blind drop (Creative will add for tube wrap and valance)
• Bias Binding - colour will be the best match unless specified
• Top and Bottom spline. If Pockets are required, please specify size. 
   For price allow 200mm per pocket price on next longer drop.
• If assembly onto existing tubes and bottom rails is required, 
  a surcharge of $55 per Re-cloth.
Re-Cloth
July 2025
Creative Wholesale Blinds
              GST Not Included

--- Page 9 ---
Standard features
• Spring Operation
• 50mm or 63mm Tube depending on width and drop
• Hood/Head Box
• 1 Pair of Auto Guides 300mm shorter than the drop of the blind
• 1 Pair of 300mm Auto Arms (other sizes available on request)
• 1 Pair of U Brackets
• 1 x 1.5m Pull Stick per supplied order (Extra Pull Stick @ $15 each)
Automatic Awnings are built tough with sturdy solid side
guides and arms. The arms are set off the walls and allows for a
generous flow of air into open windows and prevents heat from
being trapped between the material and your home. A springloaded
top roller keeps the Awning under constant tension and
helps maintain a taught, neat look over its lifetime. A simple
twist and lift mechanism allows for the quick setting of desired
positions anywhere along the automatic guides. 
Auto Awning
July 2025
Creative Wholesale Blinds
              GST Not Included
7

--- Page 11 ---
Standard Features
• Crank/Geared Operation
• 1 x 1.5m Crank Handle supplied per order (Extra Crank Handle @ $25 each)
• 50mm or 63mm Tube depending on width and drop
• Hood/Head Box
• 1 Pair of screw eyes
• 1 Pair of chain adaptors
• 1 Pair of double ended dog clips
Straight Drop Awning (Crank Op/Strap Down)
July 2025
Creative Wholesale Blinds

Straight Drop Awning (Crank Op / Strap Down)   [Uniline System]

Creative Wholesale Blinds

10


--- Page 13 ---
Standard Features
• Spring Operation
• Crank Op - add $48 per blind.  Crank Handle - $26 each.
• Centre Pulleys - add $76 per blind.
• 50mm or 63mm Tube depending on width and drop
• Hood/Head Box
• 1 Pair of Fixed Guides same size as the drop of the blind
• 1 Pair of 300mm L brackets
• 1 Pair of side guide runners
Fixed Guide Awning (Spring Op)
July 2025
Creative Wholesale Blinds
              GST Not Included

Fabric:
Canvas
Mesh:
Outlook Mode Zero 0%
Fixed Guide Awning (Spring Op)    [Uniline System]
July 2025
Creative Wholesale Blinds
              GST Not Included
12


--- Page 15 ---
Standard Features
• Crank/Geared Operation
• 1 x 1.5m Crank Handle supplied per order (Extra Crank Handle @ $25 each)
• 50mm or 63mm Tube depending on width and drop
• Hood/Head Box
• 1 Pair of Stainless steel wire cable
Wire Guide Awnings are suitable for expansive windows and
outdoor areas that require sun protection and privacy. The
benefit of the wire guide system is that it allows the blind to be
dropped to any particular height without it moving in a breeze
and can be operated by either crank handle or motorised.
The stainless steel cable and fittings are corrosion resistant
and tie in well with stainless wire balustrade.
Wire Guide Awning (Crank/Geared Op)
July 2025
Creative Wholesale Blinds
              GST Not Included
13
